General.Name: Diod OAO
General.Description: DIOD Maker of Eco-Friendly Equipment and Nutrition Public Joint Stock Company engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of biologically active additives, pharmaceuticals, and medical active cosmetics for home use. The company offers biologically active food additives, such as dietary supplements offered under Capilar, Viardo, Viardo Forte, Arthro-Active, Stella, Longevity, Cardio Capilar, Oculist , Capital, Iodine-Active, Calcium-Active Citrate, and Selenium-Active brand names. It also provides pharmaceutical products comprising Hypoxene, Orvirem, and Mebix. In addition, the company offers therapeutic active cosmetics, including Oil Balm Artro-Active Warming, Cream-Balm Artro-Active Nourishing, Foot Gel Capilar With Flavosomes, and Balm For Body Capilars. The company sells its products through wholesalers and foreign partners in Russia, Belarus, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Armenia, Serbia, Montenegro, Moldova, Latvia, the Czech Republic, Bulgaria, and internationally. DIOD Maker of Eco-Friendly Equipment and Nutrition Public Joint Stock Company was founded in 1931 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
